tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(50),
  bully_name VARCHAR(50),
  incident_date TIMESTAMP,
  evidence TEXT,
  report_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE evidence_storage (
    evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    evidence_link VARCHAR(255),
    storage_location VARCHAR(100),
    retention_policy VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    reported_by VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    reported_user VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    incident_description TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE evidence_of_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    description TEXT,
    date TIMESTAMP
)
